DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether SB-649868 safe , tolerable repeat administration adult elderly healthy volunteer . Pharmacokinetics effect cardiac function repeat dos study
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Cardiac Function After Repeat Doses SB-649868 Healthy-volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The present clinical study ass safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics SB-649868 20mg administer 28 consecutive day adult ( 18 65 yr old ) elderly ( > 65 yrs old ) men woman . The study also assess cardiac function use echocardiography .
